review_blob: One of my favorite beers of the NE.  Nice flavor, very smooth.  Definitely the top Long Trail brew, knocks the socks off their IPA.

This beer got me into IPAs.  It doesnt stand up well to real craft beers, like Dogfish Heads IPAs, but ok to drink.  Doesnt have an especially strong flavor, but I like the aroma.  Nice aftertaste, and easy to drink.
Decent beer, not a lot of flavor, though.  Plenty of carbonation, maybe overwhelming, only a small hoppy aftertaste.  Not my favorite IPA.  Perhaps the west coast version is better.
